title: VIP组没有使用东西的权限
author: a215051606
txt_content: RT,服务器里的VIP什么东西都用不了,如;斧头 剑 木头什么的都不能用

replies.author: mixturebbq
replies.txt_content:
mixturebbq 发表于 2014-9-22 20:02
mangaddi [VIP组名字] builder
比如叫做vip
mangaddi vip builder
前提是用的gruopmanager

replies.author: mixturebbq
replies.txt_content:
mangaddi [VIP组名字] builder
